Package orbotix.sphero

Control Sphero the robot subsystems

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CollisionListener Listener to handle Sphero collisions configured using CollisionControl
ConnectionListener Handles Connection, Connection Failed, and Disconnect events created by: RobotProvider.startDiscovery() or the UI Version SpheroConnectionView.startDiscovery()
DiscoveryListener Use RobotProvider.startDiscovery() to initiate the discovery of currently paired AND active Orbotix robots or use SpheroConnectionView for a prebuilt UI for connecting to Sphero.
LocatorListener Listener to handle Sphero location changes caused by driving Sphero.
SensorListener Listener to handle sensor data from Sphero.
 

Class Summary
CollisionControl Setup collision detection levels and manage CollisionListeners
ConfigurationControl Manage Orbotix Robot settings.
RobotVersion Robot Version & Subsystem versions
SensorControl Control Sensor Data Streaming from Orbotix Robot Orientation - Quaternion Orientation - Euler (roll, pitch, yaw) Accelerometer Gyro Location Velocity
Sphero Sphero is the world's first robotic ball that you control with a tilt, touch, or swing from your smartphone or tablet.
 

Enum Summary
NonPersistentOptionFlags Temporary flags that are not persisted over the robot sleep/wake cycle.
PersistentOptionFlags Flags that persist over a Sphero sleep / wake cycle.
SensorFlag Maskable flags for configuration SensorControl#setRate(int, SensorFlag...)
 

Package orbotix.sphero Description

Control Sphero the robot subsystems
